An indie rock band, the National, uses Instagram to show fans behind the scenes pictures of its tour. It's a strong and compelling way to consume moments in the world, whether it be newsworthy events or simple daily moments in a friend's life, Kevin Systrom said.`` Instead of reading what they're doing, you're seeing what they're doing.''
